source_sentence: 佛說佛名經卷第二
translation: Foshuo foming jing, vol. 2

source_sentence: 後魏北印度三藏菩提流支譯
translation: Latter Wei Northern India Tripiṭaka Bodhiruci Translation

source_sentence: 「『◎南無無垢杖佛　南無無邊杖佛　南無法杖佛　南無寶蓋佛　南無均寶蓋佛　南無摩尼蓋佛　南無金蓋佛　南無奮迅王佛　南無增上火成就王佛　南無增上勇猛佛　南無勇施佛　南無智施佛　南無然燈佛　南無然燈火佛　南無淨然燈佛　南無功德然燈佛　南無福德然燈佛　南無寶然燈佛　南無大然燈佛　南無無邊然燈佛　南無寶火然燈佛　南無普然燈佛　南無月然燈佛　南無日然燈佛　南無日月然燈佛　南無雲聲然燈佛　南無大海然燈佛　南無忍辱輪然燈佛　南無世然燈佛　南無光明遍照十方然燈佛　南無照諸趣然燈佛　南無破諸闇然燈佛　南無一切世成就然燈佛　南無諦寶幢摩尼勝光佛　南無淨華宿王智佛　南無俱蘇摩見佛　南無不散佛　南無散華佛　南無不散華佛　南無放光明佛　南無千光明佛　南無六十光明佛　南無觀光明佛　南無無障礙光明佛　南無放淨光明佛　南無無邊光明佛　南無波頭摩光明佛　南無福德光明佛　南無智光明佛　南無月光明佛　南無日光明佛　南無無礙光明佛　南無奮迅恭敬稱佛　南無無比佛　南無功德稱佛　南無寶稱佛　南無無垢稱佛　南無無垢德佛　南無堅德佛　南無無憂德佛　南無勇猛德佛　南無華德佛　南無歡喜德佛　南無龍德佛　南無功德海佛　南無淨德佛　南無淨天佛　南無供養佛　南無淨聲佛　南無淨妙聲佛　南無出淨聲佛　南無普智輪光聲佛　南無大聲佛　南無雲勝聲佛　南無安隱聲佛　南無樂聲佛　南無妙鼓聲佛　南無天聲佛　南無月聲佛　南無日聲佛　南無師子聲佛　南無波頭摩聲佛　南無福德聲佛　南無金剛聲佛　南無自在聲佛　南無慧聲佛　南無妙聲佛　南無選擇聲佛　南無甘露聲佛　南無淨幢佛　南無金剛幢佛　南無法幢佛　南無住持法佛　南無樂法佛　南無曇無竭佛　南無護法佛　南無法奮迅佛　南無法界花佛　南無護法眼佛　南無然法庭燎佛　南無法自在佛　南無人自在佛　南無功德自在佛　南無聲自在佛　南無世自在佛　南無觀世自在佛　南無無量自在佛　南無意住持佛　南無地住持佛　南無尼彌住持佛　南無器住持佛　南無功德性住持佛　南無勝色佛　南無轉發起佛　南無一切觀形示佛　南無發一切無厭足行佛　南無發成就佛　南無善護佛　南無善思惟佛　南無善喜佛　南無善處佛　南無普禪佛　南無甘露功德佛　南無善眼佛　南無師子仙佛　南無佛眼佛　南無合聚佛　南無疾智勇佛　南無善住佛　南無實行佛　南無師子手佛　南無海滿佛　南無善思惟佛　南無稱王佛　南無住慈佛　南無善夜摩佛　南無善行佛　南無善功德佛　南無善色佛　南無善識佛　南無善心佛　南無善光佛　南無師子月佛　南無不可勝佛　南無不可勝無畏佛　南無無量佛　南無速興佛　南無不動心佛　南無應稱佛　南無應不怯弱聲佛　南無不厭足藏佛　南無不盡佛　南無不可動佛　南無名無畏佛　南無名自在護世間佛　南無名龍自在聲佛　南無名法行廣慧佛　南無名妙勝自在相通稱佛　南無名妙勝自在勝佛　南無名樂法奮迅佛　南無名法界莊嚴佛　南無名大乘莊嚴佛　南無名寂靜王佛　南無名解脫行佛　南無名大海彌留起王佛　南無名合聚那羅延王佛　南無名散壞堅魔輪佛　南無名精進根寶王佛　南無名佛法波頭摩佛　南無名得佛眼分陀利佛　南無名隨前覺覺佛　南無名平等作佛　南無名初發心念遠離一切驚怖無煩惱起功德佛　南無名教化菩薩佛　南無名金剛釜奮迅佛　南無名寶像光明釜奮迅佛　南無名破壞魔輪佛　南無名初發心成就不退勝輪佛　南無名寶蓋起無畏光明佛　南無名初發心念斷疑斷煩惱佛　南無名光明破闇起三昧王佛』「善男子、善女人，若有得聞是諸佛名者，永離業障，不墮惡道。
translation: 「『◎南無無垢杖佛　南無無邊杖佛　南無法杖佛　南無寶蓋佛　南無均寶蓋佛　南無摩尼蓋佛　南無金蓋佛　南無奮迅王佛　南無增上火成就王佛　南無增上勇猛佛　南無勇施佛　南無智施佛　南無然燈佛　南無然燈火佛　南無淨然燈佛　南無功德然燈佛　南無福德然燈佛　南無寶然燈佛　南無大然燈佛　南無無邊然燈佛　南無寶火然燈佛　南無普然燈佛　南無月然燈佛　南無日然燈佛　南無日月然燈佛　南無雲聲然燈佛　南無大海然燈佛　南無忍辱輪然燈佛　南無世然燈佛　南無光明遍照十方然燈佛　南無照諸趣然燈佛　南無破諸闇然燈佛　南無一切世成就然燈佛　南無諦寶幢摩尼勝光佛　南無淨華宿王智佛　南無俱蘇摩見佛　南無不散佛　南無散華佛　南無不散華佛　南無放光明佛　南無千光明佛　南無六十光明佛　南無觀光明佛　南無無障礙光明佛　南無放淨光明佛　南無無邊光明佛　南無波頭摩光明佛　南無福德光明佛　南無智光明佛　南無月光明佛　南無日光明佛　南無無礙光明佛　南無奮迅恭敬稱佛　南無無比佛　南無功德稱佛　南無寶稱佛　南無無垢稱佛　南無無垢德佛　南無堅德佛　南無無憂德佛　南無勇猛德佛　南無華德佛　南無歡喜德佛　南無龍德佛　南無功德海佛　南無淨德佛　南無淨天佛　南無供養佛　南無淨聲佛　南無淨妙聲佛　南無出淨聲佛　南無普智輪光聲佛　南無大聲佛　南無雲勝聲佛　南無安隱聲佛　南無樂聲佛　南無妙鼓聲佛　南無天聲佛　南無月聲佛　南無日聲佛　南無師子聲佛　南無波頭摩聲佛　南無福德聲佛　南無金剛聲佛　南無自在聲佛　南無慧聲佛　南無妙聲佛　南無選擇聲佛　南無甘露聲佛　南無淨幢佛　南無金剛幢佛　南無法幢佛　南無住持法佛　南無樂法佛　南無曇無竭佛　南無護法佛　南無法奮迅佛　南無法界花佛　南無護法眼佛　南無然法庭燎佛　南無法自在佛　南無人自在佛　南無功德自在佛　南無聲自在佛　南無世自在佛　南無觀世自在佛　南無無量自在佛　南無意住持佛　南無地住持佛　南無尼彌住持佛　南無器住持佛　南無功德性住持佛　南無勝色佛　南無轉發起佛　南無一切觀形示佛　南無發一切無厭足行佛　南無發成就佛　南無善護佛　南無善思惟佛　南無善喜佛　南無善處佛　南無普禪佛　南無甘露功德佛　南無善眼佛　南無師子仙佛　南無佛眼佛　南無合聚佛　南無疾智勇佛　南無善住佛　南無實行佛　南無師子手佛　南無海滿佛　南無善思惟佛　南無稱王佛　南無住慈佛　南無善夜摩佛　南無善行佛　南無善功德佛　南無善色佛　南無善識佛　南無善心佛　南無善光佛　南無師子月佛　南無不可勝佛　南無不可勝無畏佛　南無無量佛　南無速興佛　南無不動心佛　南無應稱佛　南無應不怯弱聲佛　南無不厭足藏佛　南無不盡佛　南無不可動佛　南無名無畏佛　南無名自在護世間佛　南無名龍自在聲佛　南無名法行廣慧佛　南無名妙勝自在相通稱佛　南無名妙勝自在勝佛　南無名樂法奮迅佛　南無名法界莊嚴佛　南無名大乘莊嚴佛　南無名寂靜王佛　南無名解脫行佛　南無名大海彌留起王佛　南無名合聚那羅延王佛　南無名散壞堅魔輪佛　南無名精進根寶王佛　南無名佛法波頭摩佛　南無名得佛眼分陀利佛　南無名隨前覺覺佛　南無名平等作佛　南無名初發心念遠離一切驚怖無煩惱起功德佛　南無名教化菩薩佛　南無名金剛釜奮迅佛　南無名寶像光明釜奮迅佛　南無名破壞魔輪佛　南無名初發心成就不退勝輪佛　南無名寶蓋起無畏光明佛　南無名初發心念斷疑斷煩惱佛　南無名光明破闇起三昧王佛』「善男子、善女人，若有得聞是諸佛名者，永離業障，不墮惡道。

source_sentence: 若無眼者，誦必得眼。
translation: If someone doesn't have eyes, they'll surely get eyes when they recite their name.

source_sentence: 「『南無十千同名星宿佛　南無一切同名星宿佛　南無三十千同名釋迦牟尼佛　南無一切同名釋迦牟尼佛　南無二億同名拘隣佛　南無一切同名拘隣佛　南無十八億同名實法勝決定佛　南無一切同名實法勝決定佛　南無十八億同名日月燈佛　南無一切同名日月燈佛　南無千五百同名大威德佛　南無一切同名大威德佛　南無千五百同名日佛　南無一切同名日佛　南無四萬四千同名面佛　南無一切同名面佛　南無萬千同名堅固自在佛　南無一切同名堅固自在佛　南無萬八千同名普護佛　南無一切同名普護佛　南無千八百同名舍摩他佛　南無一切同名舍摩他佛「『劫名善眼，彼劫中有七十二那由他如來成佛，我悉歸命彼諸如來。
translation: 「『南無十千同名星宿佛　南無一切同名星宿佛　南無三十千同名釋迦牟尼佛　南無一切同名釋迦牟尼佛　南無二億同名拘隣佛　南無一切同名拘隣佛　南無十八億同名實法勝決定佛　南無一切同名實法勝決定佛　南無十八億同名日月燈佛　南無一切同名日月燈佛　南無千五百同名大威德佛　南無一切同名大威德佛　南無千五百同名日佛　南無一切同名日佛　南無四萬四千同名面佛　南無一切同名面佛　南無萬千同名堅固自在佛　南無一切同名堅固自在佛　南無萬八千同名普護佛　南無一切同名普護佛　南無千八百同名舍摩他佛　南無一切同名舍摩他佛「『劫名善眼，彼劫中有七十二那由他如來成佛，我悉歸命彼諸如來。

source_sentence: 「『劫名善見，彼劫中有七十二億如來成佛，我悉歸命彼諸如來。
translation: "'The eon is called 'good vision,' and there are 7.2 billion tathāgatas who become buddhas in that eon, to whom I owe my life.

source_sentence: 「『劫名淨讚歎，彼劫中有一萬八千如來成佛，我悉歸命彼諸如來。
translation: "The eon is called 'pure praise,' and 18,000 tathāgatas become buddhas in that eon, and I give my life to all of them.

source_sentence: 「『劫名善行，彼劫中有三萬二千如來成佛，我悉歸命彼諸如來。
translation: "'An eon is called a good practice, in which 32,000 tathāgatas become buddhas, and I give my life to all of them.'

source_sentence: 「『劫名莊嚴，彼劫中有八萬四千如來成佛，我悉歸命彼諸如來。
translation: "'The eon is called adorned, and 84,000 tathāgatas become buddhas in that eon, to whom I give my life.'

source_sentence: 「『南無現在住十方世界不捨命說法諸佛。』
translation: "'Homage to the buddhas who are now living in the worlds of the ten directions and don't abandon their lives to teach.'

source_sentence: 所謂：『安樂世界中阿彌陀佛為上首。
translation: They say, 'Among the worlds of paradise, Amitâbha is the head.'

source_sentence: 「『南無妙樂世界中，阿閦如來為上首。
translation: " 'South, Amitâbha is the head in the world of marvelous bliss.'

source_sentence: 「『南無袈裟幢世界中，碎金剛堅如來為上首。
translation: "'In the south, in the world of the surplice banner, the Tathāgata Śrīgarbha is the head.'

source_sentence: 「『南無不退輪吼世界中，清淨光波頭摩花身如來為上首。
translation: "In the south, in the world of the nonretrogressing wheel-roar, the flower-body Tathāgata of pure radiance Bodhidharma is the head.

source_sentence: 「『南無無垢世界中，法幢如來為上首。
translation: "'In the southern Pure Land, the Dharma-banner Tathāgata is the head honored one.

source_sentence: 「『南無善燈世界中，師子如來為上首。
translation: "'In the south, in the world of the well-lighted lamp, the lion tathāgata is the head.

source_sentence: 「『南無善住世界中，盧舍那藏如來為上首。
translation: "In the south, in the world of well-abiding, the Rocana-garbha Tathāgata is the head.

source_sentence: 「『南無難過世界中，功德華身如來為上首。
translation: "In the south, in the world of difficult surpasses, the Glorious Flower-body Tathāgata is the head.

source_sentence: 「『南無莊嚴慧世界中，一切通光明佛為上首。
translation: "In the south, in the world of adorned wisdom, the Buddha of all supernormal powers and lights is the head.

source_sentence: 「『南無鏡輪光明世界中，月智慧佛為上首。
translation: "In the south, in the world of the mirror-wheel light, the moon-wisdom Buddha is the head.

source_sentence: 「『南無花勝世界中，波頭摩勝如來為上首。
translation: "In the south, in the world of flower power, the Bodhisattva Bodhisattva is the head.

source_sentence: 「『南無波頭摩勝世界中，賢勝如來為上首。
translation: "In the south, in the world of Padmaśrī, the Bhadrapāla Tathāgata is the head.

source_sentence: 「『南無不瞬世界中，普賢如來為上首。
translation: "In the south, in the world of Bṛhatphala, the Tathāgata Samantabhadra is the head.

source_sentence: 「『南無普賢世界中，自在王如來為上首。
translation: "In the south, in the world of Samantabhadra, the Tathāgata Ācārya King is the head.

source_sentence: 「『南無不可勝世界中，成就一切義如來為上首。
translation: "In the south, there's the Tathāgata Accomplishing All Meanings in the Unparalleled World as the head.

source_sentence: 「『南無華藏世界中，毘盧遮那鏡像如來為上首。
translation: "South is the world of the lotus-store, with Tathāgata Vairocana Mirror Image as the head.

source_sentence: 「『南無娑婆世界中，釋迦牟尼佛為上首。
translation: "In the south, there's Śākyamuni Buddha as the head of the Saṃbha world.

source_sentence: 「『南無善說勝佛為上首。
translation: "Homage to the Śākyamuni Buddha, who is the head of the Sāvara world.

source_sentence: 「『南無自在幢王佛為上首。
translation: "Homage to the Śubhavyūha Buddha as head honored one.

source_sentence: 「『南無作火光佛為上首。
translation: "South is the head of the Buddha who produces flaming light.

source_sentence: 「『南無無畏觀佛為上首。
translation: "Ājñāta-kauṇḍinya-abhisaṃbhavajña is the head.

source_sentence: 「『如是等上首諸佛，我以身業、口業、意業，遍滿十方，一切禮拜、讚歎、供養。
translation: "Such are the chief buddhas, and I have filled the ten directions with my physical, verbal, and mental actions, venerating, praising, and making offerings to them all.

source_sentence: 彼諸如來所說妙法甚深境界、不可量境界、不可思議境界、無量境界等，我悉以身、口、意業遍滿十方，禮拜、讚歎、供養。
translation: I've filled the ten directions with the actions of body, speech, and thought, venerating, praising, and making offerings to the profound, immeasurable, inconceivable, and limitless realms of the wonderful Dharma taught by those tathāgatas.

source_sentence: 彼佛世界中，不退菩薩僧、不退聲聞僧，我悉以身、口、意業遍滿十方，頭面禮足、讚歎、供養。
translation: In that Buddha's world, I've filled ten directions with the actions of body, speech, and thought, venerating, praising, and making offerings to the nonretrogressing bodhisattva saṃgha and nonretrogressing śrāvaka saṃgha with my head and face.

source_sentence: 「『南無名降伏魔人自在佛　南無名降伏貪自在佛　南無名降伏瞋自在佛　南無名降伏癡自在佛　南無名降伏怒自在佛　南無名降伏見自在佛　南無名降伏諸戲自在佛　南無名了達法自在佛　南無名得神通自在稱佛　南無名得勝業自在稱佛　南無名起施自在稱佛　南無名起清淨戒自在稱佛　南無名起忍辱人自在稱佛　南無名起精進人自在稱佛　南無名起禪那人自在稱佛　南無名福德清淨光明自在稱佛　南無名起陀羅尼自在稱佛　南無高勝佛　南無光明勝佛　南無大勝佛　南無散香上勝佛　南無多寶勝佛　南無月上勝佛　南無賢上勝佛　南無波頭摩上勝佛　南無無量上勝佛　南無波頭摩上勝王佛　南無三昧手上勝佛　南無善說名勝佛　南無大海深勝佛　南無阿僧祇精進住勝佛　南無樂說一切法莊嚴勝佛　南無寶輪威德上勝佛　南無日輪上光明勝佛　南無無量慚愧金色上勝佛　南無功德海琉璃金山金色光明勝佛　南無寶華普照勝佛　南無起無邊功德無垢勝佛　南無起多羅王勝佛　南無樹王吼勝佛　南無法海潮勝佛　南無智清淨功德勝佛　南無樂劫火勝佛　南無不可思議光明勝佛　南無寶月光明勝佛　南無寶賢幢勝佛　南無成就義勝佛　南無寶成就勝佛　南無寶集勝佛　南無奮迅勝佛　南無不空勝佛　南無聞勝佛　南無海勝佛　南無住持勝佛　南無善行勝佛　南無龍勝佛　南無波頭摩勝佛　南無福德勝佛　南無智勝佛　南無妙勝佛　南無賢勝佛　南無勝賢勝佛　南無栴檀勝佛　南無勝栴檀勝佛　南無無量光明佛　南無幢勝佛　南無勝幢勝佛　南無無憂勝佛　南無離一切憂勝佛　南無寶杖如來　南無善寶杖佛　南無拘蘇摩勝佛　南無華勝佛　南無三昧奮迅勝佛　南無樹提勝佛　南無大勝佛　南無廣功德勝佛　南無眾勝佛「『南無清淨光世界積清淨增長勝上王佛。
translation: 「『南無名降伏魔人自在佛　南無名降伏貪自在佛　南無名降伏瞋自在佛　南無名降伏癡自在佛　南無名降伏怒自在佛　南無名降伏見自在佛　南無名降伏諸戲自在佛　南無名了達法自在佛　南無名得神通自在稱佛　南無名得勝業自在稱佛　南無名起施自在稱佛　南無名起清淨戒自在稱佛　南無名起忍辱人自在稱佛　南無名起精進人自在稱佛　南無名起禪那人自在稱佛　南無名福德清淨光明自在稱佛　南無名起陀羅尼自在稱佛　南無高勝佛　南無光明勝佛　南無大勝佛　南無散香上勝佛　南無多寶勝佛　南無月上勝佛　南無賢上勝佛　南無波頭摩上勝佛　南無無量上勝佛　南無波頭摩上勝王佛　南無三昧手上勝佛　南無善說名勝佛　南無大海深勝佛　南無阿僧祇精進住勝佛　南無樂說一切法莊嚴勝佛　南無寶輪威德上勝佛　南無日輪上光明勝佛　南無無量慚愧金色上勝佛　南無功德海琉璃金山金色光明勝佛　南無寶華普照勝佛　南無起無邊功德無垢勝佛　南無起多羅王勝佛　南無樹王吼勝佛　南無法海潮勝佛　南無智清淨功德勝佛　南無樂劫火勝佛　南無不可思議光明勝佛　南無寶月光明勝佛　南無寶賢幢勝佛　南無成就義勝佛　南無寶成就勝佛　南無寶集勝佛　南無奮迅勝佛　南無不空勝佛　南無聞勝佛　南無海勝佛　南無住持勝佛　南無善行勝佛　南無龍勝佛　南無波頭摩勝佛　南無福德勝佛　南無智勝佛　南無妙勝佛　南無賢勝佛　南無勝賢勝佛　南無栴檀勝佛　南無勝栴檀勝佛　南無無量光明佛　南無幢勝佛　南無勝幢勝佛　南無無憂勝佛　南無離一切憂勝佛　南無寶杖如來　南無善寶杖佛　南無拘蘇摩勝佛　南無華勝佛　南無三昧奮迅勝佛　南無樹提勝佛　南無大勝佛　南無廣功德勝佛　南無眾勝佛「『南無清淨光世界積清淨增長勝上王佛。

source_sentence: 「『南無普光世界普華無畏王如來。
translation: "'Homage to the Tathāgata Pūrva-rāja, the King of Universal Fearlessness, from the World of Universal Illumination.'

source_sentence: 「『南無普蓋世界名均寶莊嚴如來。』
translation: "South, there's the Tathāgata Maitreya, the World of Universal Cover, who's known as the Ornament of Treasures.

source_sentence: 「彼如來授羅網光菩薩阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記。
translation: "That Tathāgata granted the bodhisattva Rāhuṇḍarasamyak-saṃbodhi the assurance of perfect enlightenment.

source_sentence: 「『南無一寶髻世界名無量寶境界如來。』
translation: "'Homage to the Tathāgata of the World of the One Jeweled Topknot, who's called the Realm of Immeasurable Treasures.'

source_sentence: 「彼如來授不空奮迅境界菩薩阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記。
translation: "The Tathāgata then granted the Bodhisattva Bhūtāli Speedy Realm the assurance of unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment.

source_sentence: 「『南無相威德王世界名無量聲如來。』
translation: "'In the south, there's the world name of the king of form and might, the Tathāgata of Immeasurable Sound.'

source_sentence: 「彼如來授名即發心轉法輪菩薩阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記。
translation: "The Tathāgata then bestows upon the Bodhisattva the knowledge of the name that immediately arouses the mind to turn the wheel of the Dharma.

source_sentence: 「『南無名稱世界名須彌留聚集如來。』
translation: "'In the south, there's the Tathāgata Sumeru Gathering who's called the World of Names.'

source_sentence: 「彼如來授名光明輪勝威德菩薩阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記。
translation: "The Tathāgata bestowed the name Supremely Powerful Wheel of Radiance upon the Bodhisattva, Anuttarasamyak-saṃbodhicitta.

source_sentence: 「『南無善住世界名虛空寂如來。』
translation: "'Homage to the Tathāgata Ākāśapratiṣṭhita, of the World of Well-Adorned Names.'

source_sentence: 「彼如來授名月光菩薩阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記。
translation: "The Tathāgata bestowed the name Moon-light Bodhisattva's mark of unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment.

source_sentence: 「『南無地輪世界名稱力王如來。』
translation: "In the south, there's the Tathāgata known as the King of Praiseworthy Power in the ground-wheel world.

source_sentence: 「彼如來授名智稱菩薩阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記。
translation: "That Tathāgata bestowed upon the Bodhisattva known as Jñānacarita the Knowledgeable King the Knowledgeable King the Knowledgeable King the Record of Avalokitêśvara Samyak-saṃbodhi.

source_sentence: 「『南無月起光世界名放光明如來。』
translation: "'Homage to the Tathāgata Radiant Light Tathāgata of the World Where the Moon Rises in Light.'

source_sentence: 「彼如來授名光明輪菩薩阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記。
translation: "That Tathāgata bestowed the name Padmavṛṣabhavāsa Anuttarasamyak-saṃbodhicitta.

source_sentence: 「『南無袈裟幢世界名離袈裟如來。』
translation: "'In the south, there's the world name of Rāṣṭrapāla, the Tathāgata who departs from the reddish-brown robe.'

source_sentence: 「彼如來授名無量寶發起菩薩阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記。
translation: "The Tathāgata bestowed the name Immeasurable Jewels Arise Bodhisattva, which signifies the unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment of the buddhas.

source_sentence: 「『南無波頭摩華世界名種種華勝成就如來。』
translation: "'Homage to the Bodhisattva known as 'Tathāgata Who Accomplishes Excellence in the Variegated Flower' from the Bodhisattva Flower World.'

source_sentence: 「彼如來授名無量精進菩薩阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記。
translation: "The Tathāgata bestows the name Immeasurable Essence Bodhisattva's Record of Avalokitêśvara Samyak-saṃbodhi.

source_sentence: 「『南無一蓋世界名遠離諸怖毛竪如來。』
translation: "'Homage to the Tathāgata who's called Free From Terror and Whose Hair stands on end in the One Covered World.'

source_sentence: 「彼如來授名羅網光明菩薩阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記。
translation: "The Tathāgata bestowed the name Rāhuṇḍarasamyak-saṃbodhisattva, 'A record of the unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment of the Tathāgata.'

source_sentence: 「『南無種種幢世界名須彌留聚如來。』
translation: "'In the south, there's the Tathāgata Sumeruju who's called the World of Various Banners.'

source_sentence: 「彼如來授名大勝菩薩阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記。
translation: "That Tathāgata bestowed the name Bodhisattva of Great Victory, which is the mark of unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment.

source_sentence: 「『南無普光世界名無障礙眼如來。』
translation: "'In the south, there's the Tathāgata known as the Unobstructed Eye of the World of Universal Illumination.'

source_sentence: 「彼如來授名智勝菩薩阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記。
translation: "That Tathāgata bestows the name Anuttarasamyak-saṃbodhicitta on the Bodhisattva of Wisdom.

source_sentence: 「『南無賢世界名栴檀屋如來。』
translation: "In the south, there's the Tathāgata known as the Sandalwood House Tathāgata in the Bhadraka World.

source_sentence: 「彼如來授名智功德幢菩薩阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記。
translation: "That Tathāgata bestowed the mark of unsurpassed, corrected, and complete enlightenment on the Bodhisattva known as the Banner of Wisdom and Merit.

source_sentence: 「『南無賢慧世界名合聚如來。』
translation: "In the south, there's the Tathāgata of the World of Goodness and Wisdom called the Aggregate Tathāgata.

source_sentence: 「彼如來授名妙智菩薩阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記。
translation: "That Tathāgata bestowed the mark of unsurpassed, correct enlightenment on the Bodhisattva named Wonderful Wisdom.

source_sentence: 「『南無寶首世界名羅網光明如來。』
translation: "In the south, there's the Tathāgata named Rāhuṇḍarīka of Light in the Baoshu world.

source_sentence: 「彼如來授名智功德菩薩阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記。
translation: "That Tathāgata bestows the name Anuttarasamyak-saṃbodhisattva with the assurance of perfect enlightenment.

source_sentence: 「『南無安樂首世界名寶蓮花勝如來。』
translation: "'Homage to the Tathāgata known as the Jeweled Lotus Flower Victory Tathāgata of the Ānāthapiṇḍada World.'

source_sentence: 「彼如來授名波頭摩勝功德菩薩阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記。
translation: "The Tathāgata bestowed upon the Bodhisattva Prātimokṣa the name Anuttarasamyak-saṃbodhicitta.

source_sentence: 「『南無稱世界名智華寶光明勝如來。』
translation: "'Homage to the Tathāgata known as the Jeweled Radiance of the Flower of Wisdom from the World of Names.'

source_sentence: 「彼如來授名第一莊嚴菩薩阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記。
translation: "The Tathāgata bestowed the name Anuttarasamyak-saṃbodhisattva, which is the mark of enlightenment.

source_sentence: 「『南無賢臂世界名起賢光明如來。』
translation: "'Homage to the Tathāgata Bhadrapāla who's called the Tathāgata of Radiant Light who Arises from the World of Goodness.'

source_sentence: 「彼如來授名寶光明菩薩阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記。
translation: "That Tathāgata bestowed the name Baoliangming Pusa anuṭoluo sanmei sanbodhi ji.

source_sentence: 「『南無無畏世界名滅散一切怖畏如來。』
translation: "In the south, there's the Tathāgata Fearless World who's called the Tathāgata who dispels all fears.

source_sentence: 「彼如來授名無畏菩薩阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記。
translation: "That Tathāgata bestowed the name Bodhisattva of Fearlessness, which is the mark of unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment.

source_sentence: 「『南無彌留幢世界名彌留厚如來。』
translation: "In the south, there's the Tathāgata Miliṇḍa who's called Miliṇḍa Thick in the Miliṇḍa Banner world.

source_sentence: 「彼如來授名合聚菩薩阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記。
translation: "The Tathāgata bestows the name Anuttarasamyak-saṃbodhisattva, which is the mark of enlightenment.

source_sentence: 「『南無遠離一切憂惱障礙世界名無畏王如來。』
translation: "'Homage to the Tathāgata King of Fearlessness, who's called the world that's free of all the grievous and painful obstacles.'

source_sentence: 「彼如來授名多聲菩薩阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記。
translation: "The Tathāgata bestowed the name Anuttarasamyak-saṃbodhicitta.

source_sentence: 「『南無法世界名作法如來。』
translation: "'In the south, there's the Tathāgata who's called the Dharma-producing Tathāgata in the nonexistent world.'

source_sentence: 「彼如來授名智作菩薩阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記。
translation: "The Tathāgata bestowed the name Anuttarasamyak-saṃbodhisattva, which is the mark of enlightenment.

source_sentence: 「『南無善住世界名百一十光明如來。』
translation: "'In the south, there's the world of the well-abiding called the Tathāgata of the Hundred and Ten Lights.'

source_sentence: 「彼如來授名勝光明菩薩阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記。
translation: "The Tathāgata bestows the name Victorious Light Bodhisattva's mark of unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment.

source_sentence: 「『南無共光明世界名千上光明如來。』
translation: "'Homage to the Tathāgata of Thousand and One Bright Worlds.'

source_sentence: 「彼如來授名普光明菩薩阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記。
translation: "The Tathāgata bestows the name Anuttarasamyak-saṃbodhicitta on the Bodhisattva of Universal Illumination.

source_sentence: 「『南無多伽羅世界名智光明如來。』
translation: "'In the south, there's the Tathāgata of Wisdom and Radiance from the world of Tagara.'

source_sentence: 「彼如來授名善眼菩薩阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記。
translation: "The Tathāgata bestowed the name Supremely Radiant Tathāgata, the Bodhisattva of Good Eyes, which signifies the unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment.

source_sentence: 「『南無香世界名寶勝光明如來。』
translation: "In the south, there's the Tathāgata known as Jeweled Victory Illumination of the Fragrant World.

source_sentence: 「彼如來授名無量光明菩薩阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記。
translation: "The Tathāgata bestowed the name Immeasurable Light Bodhisattva, Anuttarasamyak-saṃbodhi, as a mark of enlightenment.

source_sentence: 「『◎南無光明首世界名無量光明如來。』
translation: "'-'In the south, there's the Tathāgata of Immeasurable Light, known as the Chief of Light.'

source_sentence: 「彼如來授名藥王菩薩阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記。
translation: "The Tathāgata bestowed the name Yakṣa King Bodhisattva, 'Anuttarasamyak-saṃbodhicitta,' and he gave it to me.

source_sentence: 「『南無上首賢世界名無障礙聲如來。』
translation: "'South is the name of the supreme chief worthy world, the Tathāgata of Unobstructed Sound.'

source_sentence: 「彼如來授名淨聲聲菩薩阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記。
translation: "The Tathāgata bestows the name Ābhutarasamyak-saṃbodhi as a mark of enlightenment for the Bodhisattva of Pure Sound.

source_sentence: 「『南無法世界名羅網光明如來。』
translation: "In the south, there's the Tathāgata known as the Tathāgata of Light of Luo's Net in the Avīcian world.

source_sentence: 「彼如來授名勝菩薩阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記。
translation: "The Tathāgata bestows the name Victorious Bodhisattva, Anuttarasamyak-saṃbodhicitta, as a mark of enlightenment.

source_sentence: 「『南無賢入世界名寶智慧如來。』
translation: "'In the south, there's the Tathāgata of Jeweled Wisdom who's called the Bhadraśri World.'

source_sentence: 「彼如來授名智香菩薩阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記。
translation: "The Tathāgata bestowed upon the Bodhisattva known as Fragrance of Wisdom the assurance of unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment.

source_sentence: 「『南無優鉢羅世界名無量勝如來。』
translation: "'Homage to the Tathāgata Uppāra who's called Immeasurable Victory.'

source_sentence: 「彼如來授名曇無竭菩薩阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記。
translation: "The Tathāgata bestowed the name Dharmakṣema Bodhisattva's mark of unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment.

source_sentence: 「『南無清淨世界名無量莊嚴如來。』
translation: "In the south, there's the Tathāgata known as Amitâbha of Immeasurable Adornment in the Pure World.

source_sentence: 「彼如來授名寶莊嚴菩薩阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記。
translation: "The Tathāgata bestowed the name Baoshyamuni Bodhisattva's mark of unsurpassed, correct enlightenment.

source_sentence: 「『南無覺住世界名優鉢羅勝如來。』
translation: "'Homage to the Tathāgata Upālapatra of the World of the Abode of Enlightenment.'

source_sentence: 「彼如來授名波頭摩勝菩薩阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記。
translation: "The Tathāgata bestowed the name Bodhisattva Pāturavastu Anuttarasamyak-saṃbodhicitta.

source_sentence: 「『南無波頭摩住世界名智住如來。』
translation: "'Homage to the Tathāgata known as the Abiding Tathāgata of Wisdom in the Bodhisattva's Abiding World.'

source_sentence: 「彼如來授名寶滿足菩薩阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記。
translation: "The Tathāgata bestowed the name Baosyamādity Bodhisattva's mark of unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment.

source_sentence: 「『南無智力世界名釋迦牟尼如來。』
translation: "'Homage to the Tathāgata Śākyamuni Tathāgata of the World of Wisdom.'

source_sentence: 「彼如來授名寶牟尼菩薩阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記。
translation: "The Tathāgata bestowed the name Baumūnyi Bodhisattva's mark of unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment.

source_sentence: 「『南無十方稱世界名智稱如來。』
translation: "'Homage to the Tathāgata known as the Tathāgata of Knowledge in the World of Ten Names.'

source_sentence: 「彼如來授名無邊精進菩薩阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記。
translation: "The Tathāgata bestows the name Anuttarasamyak-saṃbodhicitta on the Bodhisattva of Infinite Effort.

source_sentence: 「『南無喜世界名堅自在王如來。』
translation: "'Homage to the Tathāgata Ājñāta-kauṇḍinya of the Joyful World.'

source_sentence: 「彼如來授名寶堅菩薩阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記。
translation: "That Tathāgata bestows the name Baudhārā-samyak-saṃbodhisattva's assurance of perfect enlightenment.

source_sentence: 「『南無月世界名寶莎羅如來。』
translation: "'Homage to Tathāgata Prabhūtaratna of the Moon World.'

source_sentence: 「彼如來授名普香菩薩阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記。
translation: "That Tathāgata bestowed the name Prabhūtaratna Bodhisattva with the assurance of unsurpassed, correct enlightenment.

source_sentence: 「『南無娑婆世界名大勝如來。』
translation: "'In the south, there's the Tathāgata Saṃbha world called Mahêśvara.'

source_sentence: 「彼如來授名大勝天王菩薩阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記。
translation: "The Tathāgata bestowed the name Anuttarasamyak-saṃbodhisattva on the Bodhisattva King of Great Victory.

source_sentence: 「『南無一蓋世界名寶輪如來。』
translation: "'Homage to the name of the jeweled wheel tathāgata in the Yagai world.'

source_sentence: 「彼如來授名星宿鬘菩薩阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記。
translation: "The Tathāgata bestowed the name Anuttarasamyak-saṃbodhisattva, which is a record of unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment.

source_sentence: 「『南無過一切憂障礙世界名不空說如來。』
translation: "'In the south, there's the Tathāgata Amoghasiddhi, who's called Amoghasiddhi, who transcends all the grievous obstacles in the world.'

source_sentence: 「彼如來授名不空說菩薩阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記。
translation: "The Tathāgata bestowed the name Bukong Explained Bodhisattva's Record of Avalokitêśvara Samyak-saṃbodhi.

source_sentence: 「『南無遠離憂惱世界名功德成就如來。』
translation: "'In the south, there's the Tathāgata who's called Accomplished in Merit when he's far removed from the world of sorrow and distress.'

source_sentence: 「彼如來授名無邊勝威德菩薩阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記。
translation: "The Tathāgata bestows the name Anuttarasamyak-saṃbodhisattva, which is a record of the enlightenment of the infinitely superior bodhisattva.

source_sentence: 「『南無寂靜世界名稱王如來。』
translation: "'Homage to the Tathāgata King of Names for the Quiet World.'

source_sentence: 「彼如來授名勇德菩薩阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記。
translation: "That Tathāgata bestows the name Anuttarasamyak-saṃbodhicitta on the Bodhisattva of Courageous Virtue.

source_sentence: 「『南無不空見世界名不空奮迅如來。』
translation: "'Homage to the Tathāgata Amoghasiddhi, who's called Amoghasiddhi in the world of Amoghasiddhi.'

source_sentence: 「彼如來授名不空發行菩薩阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記。
translation: "The Tathāgata bestowed upon the Bodhisattva Pratibhāna the name Anuttarasamyak-saṃbodhicitta.

source_sentence: 「『南無香世界名香光明如來。』
translation: "'Homage to the world of fragrance, it's called Fragrant Radiance Tathāgata.'

source_sentence: 「彼如來授名寶藏菩薩阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記。
translation: "The Tathāgata bestowed the name Baosang Bodhisattva's mark of unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment.

source_sentence: 「『南無無量吼聲世界名無障礙聲如來。』
translation: "'In the south, there's the Tathāgata of Unobstructed Sound, who's called the World of Immeasurable Roar.'

source_sentence: 「彼如來授名無分別發行菩薩阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記。
translation: "The Tathāgata bestowed the name Anuttarasamyak-saṃbodhicitta as a mark of enlightenment for the Bodhisattva of Indiscriminate Distribution.

source_sentence: 「『南無月輪光明世界名稱力王如來。』
translation: "'In the south, there's the Tathāgata known as the King of Praiseworthy Power in the world of the moonlight.'

source_sentence: 「彼如來授名智稱菩薩阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記。
translation: "That Tathāgata bestows the name Wisdom-Call Bodhisattva's mark of unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment.

source_sentence: 「『南無寶輪世界名寶上勝如來。』
translation: "'Homage to the Tathāgata known as Jewel King of Power in the world of the jeweled wheel.'

source_sentence: 「彼如來授名大導師菩薩阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記。
translation: "That Tathāgata conferred the name Anuttarasamyak-saṃbodhicitta on the Bodhisattva, the Great Guide.

source_sentence: 「『南無寶輪世界名善明(丹眼)如來。』
translation: "'Homage to the Tathāgata named Sunetra (Taneye) of the jeweled wheel world.'

source_sentence: 「彼如來授名樂行菩薩阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記。
translation: "The Tathāgata bestows the name Anuttarasamyak-saṃbodhicitta on the Bodhisattva of Joyful Conduct.

source_sentence: 「『南無法世界名波頭摩勝如來。』
translation: "'In the south, there's the Tathāgata Bodhisattva called Padmaśrī in the Unfathomable World.'

source_sentence: 「彼如來授名大法菩薩阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記。
translation: "The Tathāgata bestowed the name Anuttarasamyak-saṃbodhicitta on the Bodhisattva of the Great Dharma.

source_sentence: 「『南無名須彌頂上王如來。』
translation: "In the south, there's the Tathāgata known as Sumeru-dōjō-rāja.

source_sentence: 「彼如來授名智力菩薩阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記。
translation: "That Tathāgata bestowed the name Anuttarasamyak-saṃbodhicitta on the Bodhisattva of Power.

source_sentence: 「『南無名波頭摩勝如來。』
translation: "'Homage to the Tathāgata Padmaśrī.'

source_sentence: 「彼如來授名勝德菩薩阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記。
translation: "That Tathāgata bestowed the name Supremely Virtuous Bodhisattva with the assurance of unsurpassed, correct enlightenment.

source_sentence: 「『南無陀羅尼輪世界名香光明如來。』
translation: "'Homage to the Tathāgata known as Fragrant Light Tathāgata of the Dhāraṇī Wheel World.'

source_sentence: 「彼如來授名陀羅尼自在王菩薩阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記。
translation: "The Tathāgata bestowed the name Dhāraṇī Sovereign King Bodhisattva with the assurance of unsurpassed, correct enlightenment.

source_sentence: 「『南無金光明世界名十方稱發如來。』
translation: "'Homage to the Tathāgata known as the Tathāgata of Golden Light in the World of Ten Directions.'

source_sentence: 「彼如來授名智稱發行菩薩阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記。
translation: "The Tathāgata bestowed the name Jñānacandra-rāja Bodhisattva Anuttarasamyak-saṃbodhicitta.

source_sentence: 「『南無智起世界名普清淨增上雲聲王如來。』
translation: "'Homage to the Tathāgata Zhigong world called the Universally Pure, Increasingly Enlightened Cloud-Sounding King.'

source_sentence: 「彼如來授名星宿王菩薩阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記。
translation: "The Tathāgata bestows the name Astral Constellation King Bodhisattva's Record of Avalokitêśvara Samyak-saṃbodhi.

source_sentence: 「『南無常光明世界名無量光明如來。』
translation: "'In the south, there's the Tathāgata of Immeasurable Light who's called the World of Constant Light.'

source_sentence: 「彼如來授名大光明菩薩阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記。
translation: "That Tathāgata bestowed the name Great Radiance Bodhisattva, Anuttarasamyak-saṃbodhicitta.

source_sentence: 「『南無然燈世界名無量智成就如來。』
translation: "In the south, there's the Tathāgata of Immeasurable Wisdom who's called the accomplishment of wisdom in the world of Rāntō.

source_sentence: 「彼如來授名功德王光明菩薩阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記。
translation: "That Tathāgata bestowed the name Aṇgulimālīyasamyak-saṃbodhi as a mark of the bodhisattva's accomplishment of merit.

source_sentence: 「『南無然燈作世界名無量種奮迅如來。』
translation: "'In the south, there's the Tathāgata Rendōshō world called the Tathāgata of Immeasurable Varieties of Effort.'

source_sentence: 「彼如來授名無障礙發菩薩阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記。
translation: "The Tathāgata bestows the name Anuttarasamyak-saṃbodhisattva, which is the mark of enlightenment.

source_sentence: 「『南無種種幢世界名上首如來。』
translation: "'Homage to the world known as the Sarvâstivāda Tathāgata.'

source_sentence: 「彼如來授名那羅延菩薩阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記。
translation: "That Tathāgata bestowed the name Anuttarasamyak-saṃbodhicitta on the Bodhisattva Nārāyaṇa.

source_sentence: 「『南無十方稱世界名佛華成就勝如來。』
translation: "In the south, there's the Tathāgata known in the ten directions as the Flower-Completing Tathāgata.

source_sentence: 「彼如來授名無缺奮迅菩薩阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記。
translation: "The Tathāgata bestowed the name Anuttarasamyak-saṃbodhisattva with the assurance of perfect enlightenment.

source_sentence: 「『南無金剛住世界名佛華增上王如來。』
translation: "'Homage to the Tathāgata known as the Buddha-flower Increasing King of the Vajra-dwelling World.'

source_sentence: 「彼如來授名寶火菩薩阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記。
translation: "The Tathāgata bestowed the name Baolfire Bodhisattva's Record of Aṇḍhāra Samyak-saṃbodhi.

source_sentence: 「『南無栴檀窟世界寶形如來。』
translation: "Homage to the jeweled tathāgata of the Sandalwood Cave world.

source_sentence: 「彼如來授名觀世音菩薩阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記。
translation: "That Tathāgata bestowed the name Avalokitêśvara Bodhisattva, the mark of unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment.

source_sentence: 「『南無藥王世界名不空說如來。』
translation: "'Homage to the Tathāgata Medicine King world called Amoghapāśa.'

source_sentence: 「彼如來授名不空發行菩薩阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記。
translation: "That Tathāgata bestowed the name Bukong Issuing Bodhisattva's Record of Avalokitêśvara Samyak-saṃbodhi.

source_sentence: 「『南無藥王勝上世界名無邊功德精進發如來。』
translation: "'Homage to the name of the Yakṣa King's paramount world, the Tathāgata who arouses boundless virtue and effort.'

source_sentence: 「彼如來授名不受戒攝受菩薩阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記。
translation: "The Tathāgata bestowed the name Bhūtāli and accepted the bodhisattva's record of unsurpassed, correct enlightenment.

source_sentence: 「『南無普莊嚴世界名發心生莊嚴一切眾生心如來。』
translation: "'Homage to the Tathāgata who's known as the Universally Adorned World, who arouses the aspiration to produce adornments for the minds of all sentient beings.'

source_sentence: 「彼如來授名佛華手菩薩阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記。
translation: "The Tathāgata bestows the name Buddha Flower Hand Bodhisattva, which is the record of unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment.

source_sentence: 「『南無普蓋世界名蓋鬘如來。』
translation: "'Homage to the Tathāgata who's called the Gaṇḍavyūha Tathāgata in the Pūrva-Vipaśaila World.'

source_sentence: 「彼如來授名寶行菩薩阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記。
translation: "That Tathāgata bestows the name Baoxing Bodhisattva's mark of unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment.

source_sentence: 「『南無華上光明世界名日輪威德王如來。』
translation: "'In the south, there's the Tathāgata Sun-wheel Majestic Virtue King, known as the World of Superb Flower Light.'

source_sentence: 「彼如來授名善住菩薩阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記。
translation: "That Tathāgata bestowed the name Ābhūtarasamyak-saṃbodhicitta.

source_sentence: 「『南無善莊嚴世界名眾王(丹生)光明如來。』
translation: "In the south, there's the Tathāgata known as the Vairocana (Dānsō) Light of the World of Well-Adorned Beauty.

source_sentence: 「彼如來授名寶面菩薩阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記。
translation: "That Tathāgata bestowed the name Baumian Bodhisattva's assurance of unsurpassed, correct enlightenment.

source_sentence: 「『南無賢世界名無畏如來。』
translation: "'Homage to the good world, we name it the Tathāgata of Fearlessness.'

source_sentence: 「彼如來授名不驚怖菩薩阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記。
translation: "The Tathāgata bestowed the name Not Afraid Bodhisattva, Anuttarasamyak-saṃbodhicitta.

source_sentence: 「『南無波頭摩世界名波頭摩勝光明如來。』
translation: "'In the south, there's the Tathāgata Bodhisattva of Bodhidharma's Triumphant Light.'

source_sentence: 「彼如來授名智象菩薩阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記。
translation: "The Tathāgata bestowed the name Anuttarasamyak-saṃbodhicitta on the Bodhisattva of Wisdom and Elephant.

source_sentence: 「『南無優鉢羅世界名智優鉢勝如來。』
translation: "'Homage to Upāli, the Tathāgata known as Upāli, the Tathāgata of Wisdom.'

source_sentence: 「彼如來授名無境界行菩薩阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記。
translation: "That Tathāgata bestowed the name Anuttarasamyak-saṃbodhicitta as a mark of enlightenment for the Bodhisattva of Practicing without Boundaries.

source_sentence: 「『南無寶上世界名寶作如來。』
translation: "'Homage to the name Jewel-Arising Tathāgata from the Jewel-Arising World.'

source_sentence: 「彼如來授名法作菩薩阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記。
translation: "That Tathāgata bestows the name Anuttarasamyak-saṃbodhi as a mark of enlightenment for the bodhisattva who creates dharmas.

source_sentence: 「『南無月世界名無量願如來。』
translation: "In the south, there's the Tathāgata known as the Tathāgata of Immeasurable Vows in the moon-world.

source_sentence: 「彼如來授名散華菩薩阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記。
translation: "The Tathāgata bestowed the name Saṃkusumitarāja Bodhisattva's Record of Avalokitêśvara Samyak-saṃbodhi.

source_sentence: 「『南無善住世界名寶聚如來。』
translation: "In the south, there's the Tathāgata called Jewel Cluster in the Well-Established World.

source_sentence: 「彼如來授名藥王菩薩阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記。
translation: "The Tathāgata bestowed the name Yakṣa King Bodhisattva with the assurance of unsurpassed, correct enlightenment.

source_sentence: 「『南無香光明世界名莎羅自在王如來。』
translation: "'Homage to the Tathāgata Sālêndra-rāja, of the world of fragrant light.'

source_sentence: 「彼如來授名勝慧菩薩阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記。
translation: "The Tathāgata bestowed the name Victorious Wisdom Bodhisattva, 'Anuttarasamyak-saṃbodhicitta.'

source_sentence: 「『南無華手世界名寶光明如來。』
translation: "In the south, there's the Tathāgata Flower Hand World called Jewel Light Tathāgata.

source_sentence: 「彼如來授名日德菩薩阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記。
translation: "The Tathāgata bestowed the name Śrīdevī Bodhisattva's assurance of unsurpassed, correct enlightenment.

source_sentence: 「『南無普山世界名寶山如來。』
translation: "'In the south, there's the Tathāgata called Jewel Mountain in the Pushan world.'

source_sentence: 「彼如來授名火德菩薩阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記。
translation: "The Tathāgata bestowed the name Fire Tathāgata as a mark of unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment.

source_sentence: 「『南無憂蓋入世界名上首如來。』
translation: "'In the south, there's the name Usher Tathāgata from the world of Aśvajit.'

source_sentence: 「彼如來授名上莊嚴菩薩阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記。
translation: "That Tathāgata bestowed the name Supremely Ornamented Bodhisattva's mark of unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment.

source_sentence: 「『南無無憂世界名發無邊功德如來。』
translation: "'In the south, the Tathāgata Without Sorrows World is called the Tathāgata Who Gives Rise to Unlimited Qualities.'

source_sentence: 「彼如來授名不發觀菩薩阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記。
translation: "The Tathāgata bestows the name Anuttarasamyak-saṃbodhicitta as a mark of enlightenment from the Bodhisattva who doesn't contemplate.

source_sentence: 「『南無一切功德住世界名善上首如來。』
translation: "In the south, there's the Tathāgata Supremely Virtuous Tathāgata who's known as the Abode of All Merits.

source_sentence: 「彼如來授名普至菩薩阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記。
translation: "The Tathāgata bestows the name Anuttarasamyak-saṃbodhicitta on the Bodhisattva Pratibhāna.

source_sentence: 「『南無寶光明世界名須彌光明如來。』
translation: "'Homage to Sumeru Bright Tathāgata of the World of Jewel Light.'

source_sentence: 「彼如來授名善住菩薩阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記。
translation: "That Tathāgata bestowed the name Supremely Resilient Bodhisattva, which is the mark of unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment.

source_sentence: 「『南無一切功德住世界名無量境界如來。』
translation: "'Homage to the Tathāgata of Immeasurable Realms, who's known as the world where all merits abide.'

source_sentence: 「彼如來授名藥王菩薩阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記。
translation: "The Tathāgata bestowed the name Yakṣa Bodhisattva, 'Anuttarasamyak-saṃbodhicitta,' and he gave it to me.

source_sentence: 「『南無莊嚴菩提世界名高妙去如來。』
translation: "'Homage to the Tathāgata Ornamented Bodhi World called Tathāgata of Exquisite Departure.'

source_sentence: 「彼如來授名思益勝慧菩薩阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記。
translation: "The Tathāgata bestowed the name Anuttarasamyak-saṃbodhicitta on the Bodhisattva of Viśeṣa-cinti-brahma.

source_sentence: 「『南無無垢世界名寶華成就功德如來。』
translation: "In the south, there's the Tathāgata known as Jewel Flower Accomplishing Qualities in the World of the Immaculate Conception.

source_sentence: 「彼如來授名得勝慧菩薩阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記。
translation: "The Tathāgata bestows the name Anuttarasamyak-saṃbodhisattva, which is the mark of enlightenment.

source_sentence: 「『南無雲世界名奮迅如來。』
translation: "'In the south, there's the Tathāgata known as the Speedy Tathāgata of the Cloudless World.'

source_sentence: 「彼如來授名自在觀菩薩阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記。
translation: "The Tathāgata bestowed the name Anuttarasamyak-saṃbodhicitta as a mark of enlightenment for the Bodhisattva of Freely Observing.

source_sentence: 「『南無華網覆世界名一切發眾生信發心如來。』
translation: "'In the south, there's the Tathāgata Flower Net Covering World who's called the Tathāgata who arouses the faith and arouses the aspiration of all sentient beings.'

source_sentence: 「彼如來授名勝慧菩薩阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記。
translation: "The Tathāgata bestows the name Supremely Wise Bodhisattva's mark of unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment.

source_sentence: 「『南無星宿行世界名樂星宿起如來。』
translation: "'Homage to the world of the constellations and their movements, it's called the Tathāgata who enjoys the arising of the constellations.'

source_sentence: 「彼如來授名無憂菩薩阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記。
translation: "The Tathāgata bestowed the name Anuttarasamyak-saṃbodhisattva, which is the mark of enlightenment.

source_sentence: 「『南無寶華世界名勝眾如來。』
translation: "'Homage to the world of the jeweled flowers, called the Tathāgata of the Victorious Multitude.'

source_sentence: 「彼如來授名妙勝菩薩阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記。
translation: "That Tathāgata bestowed the name Mañjuśrī Bodhisattva's mark of unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment.

source_sentence: 「『南無無量至世界名無量華如來。』
translation: "'In the south, there's the Tathāgata known as the Immeasurable Flower Tathāgata of the Immeasurable Realm.'

source_sentence: 「彼如來授名香象菩薩阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記。
translation: "That Tathāgata bestowed the name Fragrant Elephant Bodhisattva with the assurance of unsurpassed, correct enlightenment.

source_sentence: 「『南無華世界名寶勝如來。』
translation: "In the south, there's the Tathāgata Flower World called Jeweled Tathāgata.

source_sentence: 「彼如來授名遠離諸有菩薩阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記。
translation: "The Tathāgata bestowed the name Anuttarasamyak-saṃbodhisattva, which is free from all existence.

source_sentence: 「『南無種種幢世界名月勝功德如來。』
translation: "'In the south, there's the Tathāgata known as Moonsurpassing Qualities in the World of Varieties.'

source_sentence: 「彼如來授名斷一切諸難菩薩阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記。
translation: "The Tathāgata bestows the name Anuttarasamyak-saṃbodhisattva, which is the mark of enlightenment for the bodhisattva who ends all difficulties.

source_sentence: 「『南無可樂世界名即發心轉法輪如來。』
translation: "'In the south, there's the Tathāgata known as the Immediately Arising Mind Turning the Wheel of the Dharma in the World of Bliss.'

source_sentence: 「彼如來授名不退轉菩薩阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記。
translation: "The Tathāgata bestows the name Anuttarasamyak-saṃbodhicitta, which is the mark of the nonretrogressing bodhisattva.

source_sentence: 「『南無無畏世界名十方稱名如來。』
translation: "'In the south, the fearless world is called the Tathāgata who praises the names of the ten directions.'

source_sentence: 「彼如來授名智稱菩薩阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記。
translation: "That Tathāgata bestows the name Zhichao pusa anuṭrasamyak-saṃbodhicitta.

source_sentence: 「『南無自在世界迦陵伽佛　南無安樂世界日輪燈明佛　南無無畏世界寶勝佛　南無智成就世界智起佛　南無純樂世界功德王住佛　南無蓋行花世界無障礙眼佛　南無金剛輪世界無畏佛　南無發起世界智積佛　南無善清淨世界無觀相發行佛　南無普光明世界光明輪威德王勝佛　南無高幢世界因慧佛　南無德世界那羅延佛　南無無垢世界無垢幢佛　南無遠離一切憂障世界安隱佛　南無賢上世界遠離諸煩惱佛　南無一切安樂世界清淨慧佛　南無無量功德具足世界善思惟發佛　南無平等平等世界降伏諸怨佛　南無無畏世界優波羅勝佛　南無十方光明世界勝力王佛「『南無如是等無量無邊佛。
translation: 「『南無自在世界迦陵伽佛　南無安樂世界日輪燈明佛　南無無畏世界寶勝佛　南無智成就世界智起佛　南無純樂世界功德王住佛　南無蓋行花世界無障礙眼佛　南無金剛輪世界無畏佛　南無發起世界智積佛　南無善清淨世界無觀相發行佛　南無普光明世界光明輪威德王勝佛　南無高幢世界因慧佛　南無德世界那羅延佛　南無無垢世界無垢幢佛　南無遠離一切憂障世界安隱佛　南無賢上世界遠離諸煩惱佛　南無一切安樂世界清淨慧佛　南無無量功德具足世界善思惟發佛　南無平等平等世界降伏諸怨佛　南無無畏世界優波羅勝佛　南無十方光明世界勝力王佛「『南無如是等無量無邊佛。

source_sentence: 「『南無常光明世界無量光明香雲彌留佛　南無常莊嚴世界降伏男女佛　南無沈水香世界上勝香佛　南無常莊嚴世界種種花佛　南無香蓋世界無邊智佛　南無栴檀香世界寶上王佛　南無香世界香彌留佛　南無普喜世界知見一切眾生信佛　南無不可量世界無邊聲佛　南無佛華莊嚴世界智功德勝佛　南無善住世界不動步佛「『歸命如是等無量無邊佛應知。
translation: "Namo Jōshō Kōkaku Kōryū Maitreya Buddha, Namo Jōtō Teishō Kōkaku Kōkaku Kōkaku Kōkaku Kōkaku Kōkaku Kōkaku Kōkaku Kōkaku Kōkaku Kōkaku Kōkaku Kōkaku Kōkaku Kōkaku Kōkaku Kōkaku Kōkaku Kōkaku Kōkaku Kōkaku Kōkaku Kōkaku Kōkaku Kōkaku Kōkaku Kōkaku Kōkaku Kōkaku Kōkaku Kōkaku Kōkaku Kōkaku Kōkaku Kōkaku Kōkaku Kōkaku Kōkaku Kōkaku Kōkaku Kōkaku Kōkaku Kōkaku Kōkaku Kōkaku Kōkaku Kōkaku Kōkaku Kōkaku Kōkaku Kōkaku Kōkaku.

source_sentence: 「『南無華世界無障礙吼聲佛　南無月世界普寶藏佛　南無堅住世界迦葉佛　南無普波頭摩世界觀一切境界鏡佛　南無栴檀世界上首佛　南無實世界成就義佛　南無有月世界成就勝佛　南無無障礙世界名稱佛　南無安樂世界斷一切疑佛「『歸命如是等無量無邊佛應知。
translation: "'To the Buddha of the Flower World's unobstructed roar, the Buddha of the Moon World's universally treasured store, the Buddha of the Resolute World's Kāśyapa, the Buddha of the Mirror of All Realms from the Prabhūtaratna World, the Buddha of the Crown Prince from the Sandalwood World, the Buddha of Accomplished Meaning from the Real World, the Buddha of Accomplished Victory from the Moon World, the Buddha of Names from the Unobstructed World, and the Buddha of Ending All Doubts from the World of Peace and Bliss,' and 'To these measureless and limitless buddhas who should be known.'

source_sentence: 「『南無光王世界智勝佛　南無普畏世界月佛　南無種種成就世界功德微佛　南無種種華世界星宿王佛　南無廣世界無量幢佛　南無羅網世界羅網光明佛　南無無驚怖世界淨聲佛　南無可樂世界現寶勝佛　南無離觀世界一切法無所發佛　南無常稱世界不斷一切眾生發行佛「『歸命如是等無量無邊佛應知。
translation: "Namo wisdom surpassing the world of the king of light, Namo moon-buddha in the world of universal fear, Namo nuances of merit in the world of various achievements, Namo starry night king in the world of various flowers, Namo measureless banner in the wide world, Namo brightness of the net in the world of the net, Namo pure sound in the world of no fear, Namo precious excellences in the world of pleasant manifestations, Namo all things in the world of free observation, Namo unceasingly issuing all sentient beings in the world of constant praise," "To these measureless and limitless buddhas should be known.

source_sentence: 「『南無常歡喜世界無量奮迅佛　南無普鏡世界建一切法佛　南無普照世界普見一切法佛　南無一切功德成就世界成就無邊勝功德佛　南無無垢世界智起光佛　南無無怖優鉢羅世界波頭摩勝佛　南無波頭摩怖世界十方勝佛　南無花怖世界華成就勝佛　南無天世界堅固眾生佛　南無光明世界智光明佛「『歸命如是等無量無邊佛應知。
translation: 「『南無常歡喜世界無量奮迅佛　南無普鏡世界建一切法佛　南無普照世界普見一切法佛　南無一切功德成就世界成就無邊勝功德佛　南無無垢世界智起光佛　南無無怖優鉢羅世界波頭摩勝佛　南無波頭摩怖世界十方勝佛　南無花怖世界華成就勝佛　南無天世界堅固眾生佛　南無光明世界智光明佛「『歸命如是等無量無邊佛應知。

source_sentence: 「『南無安樂調世界修智佛　南無安樂世界遠離胎佛　南無無染世界明王佛　南無雲世界斷一切煩惱佛　南無普色世界無邊智稱佛　南無堅固世界栴檀屋勝佛　南無無比功德世界成就無比勝佛華佛　南無寶世界善住力王佛　南無十方上首世界起月光佛　南無龍王世界上首佛「『歸命如是等無量無邊佛應知。
translation: "'Homage to such measureless and limitless buddhas as these should be known: "Homage to the Cultivation of Wisdom Buddha of the World of Bliss and Tension, the Cultivation of Wisdom Buddha of the World of Bliss, the Far Removal from the Womb Buddha of the World of No Defilement, the Illuminating King Buddha of the World of No Defilement, the Cutting Off of All Afflictions Buddha of the World of Cloud, the Infinite Wisdom-Comparation Buddha of the World of Universal Form, the Sandalwood House Victory Buddha of the World of Firmness, the Incomparable Victory Buddha Flower Buddha of the World of Incomparable Merit, the Well-Established Power King Buddha of the World of Treasures, the Moonlight Buddha of the World of the Chief of the Ten Directions, and the Chief Buddha of the World of Dragon Kings.

source_sentence: 「『南無善住世界善高聚佛　南無無怖畏世界作稱佛　南無愛香世界斷諸難佛　南無成就一切功德善住世界稱親佛　南無成就一切勢力善住世界稱堅固佛　南無憂慧世界遠離諸憂佛　南無稱世界起波頭摩功德王佛　南無花俱蘇摩住世界善散華幢佛　南無十方名稱世界放光明普至佛　南無十方上首世界名稱眼佛「『歸命如是等無量無邊佛應知。
translation: "Namojñāgulimālīya world, the well-adorned high-aggregate Buddha, Namojñānapratima world, the praiseworthy Buddha, Namojñānaprasthāna world, the difficult-body Buddha, Namojñānapratima world, the intimate Buddha, Namojñānaprasthāna world, the resolute Buddha, Namojñānaprasthāna world, the sorrowful wisdom world, the sadness-free Buddha, Namojñānaprasthāna world, the lotus flower banner, Namojñānaprasthāna world, the brightly shining universal Buddha, and Namojñānaprasthāna world, the eyes of the ten chief buddhas.

source_sentence: 「『南無焰慧世界放焰佛　南無吼世界十方稱名佛　南無光明世界自在彌留佛　南無寶光明世界大光明佛　南無常歡喜世界焰熾佛　南無有世界三界自在奮迅佛　南無無畏世界放光明輪佛　南無常懸世界眾寂勝佛　南無波頭摩王世界無盡勝佛　南無普吼世界妙鼓聲佛「『歸命如是等無量無邊佛應知。
translation: "'Homage to such measureless and limitless buddhas as these should be known: 'Homage to such measureless and limitless buddhas as these should be known: 'Homage to such measureless and limitless buddhas as these should be known: 'Homage to such measureless and limitless buddhas as these should be known: 'Homage to such measureless and limitless buddhas as these should be known: 'Homage to such measureless and limitless buddhas as these should be known: 'Homage to such measureless and limitless buddhas as these should be known: 'Homage to such measureless and limitless buddhas as these should be known: 'Homage to such measureless and limitless buddhas as these should be known:'

source_sentence: 「『南無無畏世界普勝佛　南無十方名稱世界智勝佛　南無地世界山王佛　南無地功德世界波頭摩輪境界勝王佛　南無然燈輪世界善住佛　南無普莊嚴世界大莊嚴佛境界佛　南無倚世界作一切功德佛　南無歡喜世界畢竟成就佛　寶功德佛　南無星宿行世界智上勝佛　南無蓋行莊嚴世界智起光明威德王勝佛「『歸命如是等無量無邊諸佛應知。
translation: "'To the Buddha of Universal Victory in the World of Fearlessness, the Buddha of Wisdom Victory in the World of Names in the Ten Directions, the Mountain King Buddha in the World of Earthly Merit, the Bodhidharma Wheel Realm Victory King Buddha in the World of Earthly Merit, the Well-abiding Buddha in the World of the Lamp Wheel, the Buddha of the Realm of the Great Adornment Buddha in the World of Universal Adornment, the Buddha of All Works in the World of Reliance, the Buddha of Ultimate Achievement in the World of Joy, the Buddha of Jeweled Merit, the Buddha of Superior Wisdom in the World of Astral Constellations, the King of Majestic Virtue Victory in the World of Adorned Correct Practices, and the King of Radiant Wisdom in the World of Adorned Correct Practices,' and 'To such incalculable and limitless buddhas as these, you should know.

source_sentence: 「『南無法波頭摩世界波頭摩生王佛　南無法境界自在佛(梵本中自此已下皆有世界，略不明矣)　南無月中光明佛　南無香象佛　南無阿彌陀光明佛　南無波頭摩山佛　南無波頭摩生勝佛　南無栴檀勝佛　南無寶積佛　南無智慧佛「『歸命如是等無量無邊諸佛應知。
translation: "'To the Buddha of Immeasurable Bodhidharma, the King of Bodhidharma's Life, the Buddha of Immeasurable Realms' (there are worlds in the Sanskrit text from here on down, but they're omitted.) 'To the Buddha of Light in the Moon, the Buddha of Incense and Elephants, the Buddha of Amitâbha's Light, the Buddha of Bodhidharma's Mountain, the Buddha of Bodhidharma's Life, the Buddha of Sandalwood's Life, the Buddha of Accumulation of Treasures, and the Buddha of Wisdom,' "'I owe my life to such measureless and limitless buddhas as these.

source_sentence: 「『南無無畏作王佛　南無功德成就勝佛　南無光明幢佛　南無無量功德作佛　南無功德成就勝佛　南無一切功德成就勝佛　南無波頭摩成就勝佛　南無炬住持佛　南無寶上勝佛　南無金色華佛「『歸命如是等無量無邊諸佛應知。
translation: "There are measureless and limitless buddhas to whom one should give homage, such as these.

source_sentence: ◎佛說佛名經卷第二
translation: Foshuo foming jing roll 2
